522500.name: WildStar: Jumpstart Pack
522500.description:
Get instant access to Housing, Décor, Hoverboards, and more!

Grab the Jumpstart Pack and get your character rocketing toward success! With bonuses and goodies like a 16 slot bag, some spending cash, early access to housing, and a hoverboard, the Jumpstart Pack will help set you off on your adventures.

The Jumpstart Pack includes:

Bag of Big Beginnings (16-slot Bag)
Housewarming Gift Pack (Housing Décor)
Flask of Advancement (1x 3 hour XP Potion)
Shardspire Canyon FABkit (Jump Puzzle Challenge)
Blue Steel Hoverboard with Flare (Mount)
Housing Teleport (Immediate Access to Housing)
New Homesteaders Allowance (5 gold)
522500.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 德语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
